gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Interface IVirtualArray

All Known Subinterfaces:
IMutableVirtualArray, IMutableVirtualArray2D, IMutableVirtualArrayList1D, IPhysicalArray3D, IPhysicalArray3DList, IPointList3D, ISparseArray3D, ISparseArray3DList, IVirtualArray2D, IVirtualArrayList1D
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayGenerator, PhysicalArray3D, PhysicalArray3DList, PointList3D, SparseArray3D, SparseArray3DList, VirtualArray2D, VirtualArrayList1D
public interface IVirtualArray

This interface defines methods common to all virtual arrays, whether or not the values of the virtual array can be changed. In many cases a virtual array interface will be implemented by a class that wraps a data extraction or data production process. The values are derived and cannot be directly altered. IF it is meaningful to set values in a virtual array, then a "Mutable" virtual array interface should be implemented.

setTitle

void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
This method will assign a title to the data.

getDimension

int getDimension()
Gets the dimension of the VirtualArray. For example, IVirtualArray1D = 1, IVirtualArray2D = 2.

Returns:
dimension of VirtualArray. This value is an primative integer not a Dimension.

getAxisInfo

AxisInfo getAxisInfo(int axis)
Get detailed information about this axis.

Parameters:
axis - The integer code for the axis, starting at 0.
Returns:
The axis info for the axis specified.
See Also:
AxisInfo

setAxisInfo

void setAxisInfo(int axis,
                 AxisInfo info)
Sets the attributes of the data array within a AxisInfo wrapper. This method will take in an integer to determine which axis info is being altered.

Parameters:
axis - Use AxisInfo.X_AXIS (0), AxisInfo.Y_AXIS (1), AxisInfo.Z_AXIS (3), AxisInfo.W_Axis (4), as appropriate, depending on the dimensionality of the data for the specific implementing class.
info - The axis info object associated with the axis specified.
